titleStmt.title: Bibliotheca Baconia, or, A collection of choice English books all in folio, curiously bound, gilt, and lettered on the back, consisting of various subjects but chiefly history, formerly belonging to Mr. Francis Bacon, lately deceased, will be exposed to sale ... on Wednesday next being the 19th of May, 1686 ...
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
